title: Carpet cleaners in metro Atlanta
text:
How clean is your carpet?
Earlier this year, a Huffington Post article called carpets hotbeds of "bacteria, pollen, dust and dead skin." While most people vacuum regularly, vacuuming alone can't always clear out all of the harmful agents that might be living in your home.
So, if you're overdue for a carpet cleaning, here's a list of companies in metro Atlanta with the best Google reviews.
Mr. Steam
4.9 stars, 404-513-1311
Office location: Atlanta
Services: Carpet, rug, hardwood floor, tile and grout, upholstery, mattress, auto interior and leather upholstery cleaning. Also carpet repair and stretching.
Service areas: Atlanta Metro area, including Buckhead, Brookhaven, Sandy Springs, Smyrna, Marietta, Decatur, Dunwoody, Roswell, Alpharetta, Johns Creek and Duluth.
Dirt Blasters
4.9 stars, 404-403-0045
Office location: Peachtree Corners
Services: Cleaning services for carpets, upholstery, sofas, tile and grout, mattresses, auto upholstery and area rugs. Odor removal and flood damage restoration services are also available.
Service areas: Atlanta, Buckhead, Vinings, Decatur, Marietta, Sandy Springs, Dunwoody, Roswell, Alpharetta, Brookhaven.
Zerorez Atlanta
4.9 stars, 770-242-1313
Office location: Norcross
Services: Cleaning services for carpet, area rugs, tile and grout and air ducts. Hardwood floor resurfacing.
Service areas: The entire greater Atlanta area including parts of Dawsonville, Newnan, Locust Grove, Jefferson, Cartersville and Villa Rica.
Citrus Fresh
4.9 stars, 404-606-2155
Office location: Buckhead/Chastain
Services: Carpet cleaning, pet stains and odors, area rug cleaning and upholstery cleaning.
Service areas: Citrus Fresh covers most of the Atlanta metro area.
OxiFresh Carpet Cleaning
5.0 stars, 678-365-3001
Office location: Atlanta
Services: Cleaning services for carpets, rugs, upholstery, tile and grout and wood floors.
Service areas: Atlanta, Buckhead, Cumberland, Northwestern, Vinings and more.
Technicare
5.0 stars, 404-848-0901
Office location: Cumming
Services: Carpet cleaning, water damage restoration, window cleaning, power washing, gutter cleaning, wood floor care, upholstery cleaning, tile and grout cleaning, deck refinishing, blind cleaning, air duct cleaning and Christmas lighting.
Service areas: Forsyth County and parts of North Fulton, DeKalb, Gwinnet and Cobb.

Service areas: Atlanta, Brookhaven, Sandy Springs, Dunwoody, Chamblee, Smyrna, Marietta,
Johns Creek, Alpharetta, Roswell, Milton, Duluth, Kennesaw, Mableton, Austell and Decatur.

5.0 stars, 770-232-6110

Service areas: D&M services most places in Fulton, DeKalb, Gwinnett, Newton and Rockdale counties.
